project.title: EduEditor: A Block-Based, Extensible Slate.js Rich Text Editor
project.excerpt: EduEditor is a block-based, developer-friendly rich text editor built on Slate.js. Designed for maximum extensibility, it lets you define, compose, and customize content blocks with ease.
